channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Twin Peaks cast touring the US
item.description: 🎶✨ Dive into the world of Twin Peaks with their US tour! Who's ready for a musical mystery road trip? 🚗🌲 #TwinPeaks #MusicNews

item.title: 5 Seconds of Summer’s Michael Clifford Announces Debut Solo Album ‘Sidequest’
item.description: 🎉 Exciting news alert! 🚨 @Michael5SOS of @5SOS is dropping his solo album 'Sidequest'! Who else is ready to jam out? 🎶 #MichaelClifford #Sidequest

item.title: Forth Wanderers Announce First Album Since 2018, Share New Video: Watch
item.description: ✨ New music alert! Forth Wanderers are back with a bang 🎶 Check out their latest video now! #MusicNews #ForthWanderers

item.title: Pulp Share Video for New Song “Got to Have Love”: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Dive into the infectious new vibes from Pulp! Hit play and groove to “Got to Have Love” now! 🕺 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Metric livestreaming Toronto ‘Fantasies’ show
item.description: 🎶 Tune in for a virtual front-row seat to Metric's 'Fantasies' show in Toronto! Let the music magic flow! 🌟 #livestream #Metric #Toronto
